prefercite.p: Harold Newman Selected Correspondence #6191. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: July 1977. Regarding possible appointment as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board.
August 1977. Recommendation for appointment as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board
October 1977 Councilgram. Congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board.
November 1977. Mostly ongratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
December 1977. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
January 1978. Mostly ongratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
February 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
March 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
April 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.
April 1988. Regarding David Randles' appointment as the New York Member of the Port Authority Labor Relations Panel. Includes an explanatory note from January 1998.
Includes letters of congratulations, news clippings, program, and other materials
